scripts.build:all: npm run build:polaris && npm run copy:files
scripts.build:polaris: cd polaris && pnpm install && cd polaris.shopify.com && pnpm build
scripts.copy:files: mkdir -p dist && cp -r polaris/polaris.shopify.com/.next/standalone/* dist/ && cp index.html dist/ && mkdir -p dist/polaris && cp -r polaris/polaris.shopify.com/.next/standalone/* dist/polaris/
